channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Total Hacks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Total Hacks

item.title: CVE-2022-3096|2024-08-03T01:00:10.099Z -- unknown -- wp%20total%20hacks
item.description: The WP Total Hacks WordPress plugin through 4.7.2 does not prevent low privilege users from modifying the plugin's settings. This could allow users such as subscribers to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks against other users, like administrators, due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping as well.
